tweet: We are WCAFI, the World Clean Air Forest Initiative, we want to to help fight climate change, deforestation and pollution.
We have come up with a product to help clean the air, we call it the Clean Air Tree Kit, i will post photos and details later
Did i mention the website address was: www.wcafi.org
Are you aware of UNEP's  Billion Tree Campaign www.unep.org/billiontreecampaign/ WCAFI are part of this campaign, join us and .help plant.
It's a beautiful evening in Barcelona and Mark and I are implementing a fresh new design for the website
